text: Pin Point is an unincorporated community in Chatham County, Georgia, United States; it is located southeast of Savannah. Pin Point is part of the Savannah Metropolitan Statistical Area.Pin Point, Georgia The town is best known as the birthplace of Supreme Court Justice Clarence Thomas on June 23, 1948. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Pin Point, Georgia
